cause.description:
Our mission is to stop the merciless destruction of the rainforest in Madagasgar. Most oof the annimals found there can only line there and are only found one the tiny island, hundreds of achers of this forest are destryoed eveyday. Once it is gone hundres of sepcies will be no more like the Mamoth and the Do-do. There is no getting this island back so we must save it.
1. Madagasgar must be saved
2. People must become aware
3. Animals have a right to a home in the wild
cause.name: Save Madagasgar Damn it!
